name: zendesk
description: Consumes incoming notification messages and creates Zendesk tickets from them

parameters.name: requester_name
parameters.description: The name that goes in the Requester field on Zendesk

parameters.name: requester_email
parameters.description: The email of the Requester on Zendesk

parameters.name: warning_priority
parameters.description: Ticket Priority for Warning Notifications (must be 'urgent', 'high', 'normal', or 'low')

parameters.name: error_priority
parameters.description: Ticket Priority for Error Notifications (must be 'urgent', 'high', 'normal', or 'low')

humanizers.500: Message could not be imported to Zendesk.
